actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 542 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 542 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 539. (consideration: CR S6045, S6047-6048, S6061; text: CR S6047) To authorize the Governors of the States to elect to participate in the renewable fuel program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 542 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 539.

amends_amendment.purpose: To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.

purpose: To authorize the Governors of the States to elect to participate in the renewable fuel program.
